item.title: 在Docker内打开Jupiter-notebook
item.description: 参考教程：https://medium.com/codex/how-to-setup-jupyter-notebook-on-mac-b0c2e3c66e60 范例 There are many Jupyter images, depending on the variety of Python libraries installed and the additional setup of R and/or PySpark use scipy-notebook, which contains most of the basic data science libraries that I need. It contains dask , pandas , numexpr , matplotlib , scipy , seaborn , scikit-learn , scikit-image , sympy , cython , patsy , statsmodel , cloudpickle , dill , numba , bokeh , sqlalchemy , hdf5 , vincent , beautifulsoup , protobuf , xlrd , bottleneck , and pytables packages.
